name: Marrakesh Express (Pomegranate Mezcal Cocktail With Harissa)
description: This mezcal cocktail has a remarkably complex flavor without using any bitters, fancy syrups, or liqueurs.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces (45ml) pomegranate juice (fresh preferred, see notes)
1/2 to 1 teaspoon (3 to 5ml) harissa paste, either homemade or store-bought (such as DEA)
Splash aquafaba or egg white (about 1 tablespoon) (see note)
Pinch each pomegranate seeds, cracked pink peppercorns, and flaky salt (black, smoked, or Maldon), for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mezcal, pomegranate juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, harissa, rose water, and aquafaba in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously without ice for 20 seconds to emulsify.
Add ice, reseal shaker, and shake until chilled and foamy, about 30 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.
Garnish with a sprinkle of pomegranate seeds, cracked pink peppercorns, and flaky salt.
